info.description: Request To Pay (RTP) is a Temenos Payments Application that helps Temenos bank manage their request to pay functionality. It provides RTP functionality and information exchange between the actor (payer or payee) and the RTP clearing. This page lists the APIs offered by Temenos RTP Application to consume and manage R2P functionality by Payee and Payer, who are typically accessing the application from a bank based online channel.
info.title: Request to Pay

post.description: Create payment requests for EBA and UK scheme from Biller application

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

get.description: Retrieves the list of RTP requests which are received by the Payer. The API retrieves RTPs in various states - Completed, Partially paid, Extension Granted, Declined, Extension Declined and Asked For Extension. This API is only to be used for Payer Side.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: scheme
parameters.description: Represents the scheme (a synonym for the National ID type) under which the National ID is defined

parameters.name: requestorReference
parameters.description: Contains the reference of the requestor

parameters.name: currentState
parameters.description: Contains the current state of the transaction

parameters.name: endToEndReference
parameters.description: Indicates the end to end reference for the payment. This field can be provided by the person who instructs the payment and this flows through the lifecycle of the payment.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

put.summary: Accept the RTP request and pay partially
put.description: Enables the Payer to accept RTP Request and pay partial amount. The original request sent by the biller remains open until the total amount is paid by the payer

get.summary: RTP Requests sent which are pending to be acknowledged by Payee as payment received
get.description: Retrieves the RTP requests which are yet to be acknowledged by the Payee for a payment that has come in due to a result of RTP Request being accepted by Payer. Generally, Partially paid or Paid are the two statuses in which Payee can send an acknowledgement message corresponding to a payment received

get.summary: Retrieve the RTP requests in error status
get.description: Retrieves the RTP requests which are in error status due to technical reasons. Such requests must be checked for the reason for error manually and a new RTP Request must be created/initiated by Payee to send the request again to Payer

post.summary: UK RTP scheme request initiation (RSP - RSP)
post.description: Creates an RTP Request at the RSP. The API is for RSP-RSP communication for Biller RSP to place RTP request with Payer RSP.  This is a provider API which can be linked to any published API in accordance to requesttopay.co.uk standards.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

put.summary: UK RTP scheme message exchanges between Biller and Payer (RSP - RSP)
put.description: API to exchange RTP messages between Biller RSP and Payer RSP.   The API can be used for exchanging various follow up messages for an RTP Request (subsequent to RTP initiation) such as Acceptance of the request in full or partial, Denial of a request, exchange of notes, Expiry date extension management, Payment acknowledgements.  This is a provider API which can be linked to any published API in accordance to requesttopay.co.uk standards.

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

chargeName.description: The description of the charge to be taken for payment

chargeCurrency.description: Indicates the currency code of the charge account from where the fee is deducted

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

chargeAccountCurrencyAmount.description: Holds the charge to be applied for the corresponding charge type for the order in the currency of the charge account

basketReference.description: Indicates the identifier of the basket to be displayed on the biller's portal and paid by the payer

requestorUrl.description: Contains the URL of the requestor which allows the payer to access the portal of the requestor

errorDetail.description: Error details of the Bundle account

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

requestedExecutionDate.description: Indicates the date at which the payment needs to be executed as requested by the Requestor

payerName.description: Contains the name of the payer

payerStreetName.description: Contains the street name of the payer

payerBuildingNumber.description: Contains the building number of the payer

payerPostalCode.description: Contains the postal code of the payer

payerTownName.description: Contains the town name of the payer

payerCountry.description: Contains the country of the payer

payerDateOfBirth.description: Contains the date of birth of payer

payerCityOfBirth.description: Contains the city of birth of payer

payerCountryOfBirth.description: Contains the country of birth of the payer

payerBankBic.description: Contains the bank Business Identfier Code (BIC) of the payer

payerBankSortCode.description: Contains the bank sort code of the payer

serviceAgreementCode.description: Contains a pre-agreed service code which has been agreed between the payer and the requestor

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order. For example: BEN(All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR(All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA(Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)

requestorBankSortCode.description: Contains the bank sort code of the requestor

requestorBankBic.description: Contains the bank Business Identfier Code (BIC) of the requestor

requestorName.description: Contains the name of the requestor

requestorStreetName.description: Contains the street name of the requestor

requestorBuildingNumber.description: Contains the building number of the requestor

requestorPostalCode.description: Contains the postal code of the requestor

requestorTownName.description: Contains the town name of the requestor

requestorCountry.description: Contains the country of the requestor

requestorDateOfBirth.description: Contains the date of birth of the requestor

requestorCityOfBirth.description: Contains the city of birth of the requestor

requestorCountryOfBirth.description: Contains the country of birth of the requestor

remittanceReference.description: Contains the remittance reference of the requestor's bill

remittanceLocationMethod.description: Indicates the possible methods in which the remittance information can be sent

remittanceLocationDetails.description: Contains the actual value of the remittance method by which remittance information is sent

remittanceInformation.description: Indicates the remittance information that is supplied to enable the matching/reconciliation of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system, in an unstructured form.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

amountModificationAllowed.description: Indicates if a payer is allowed to modify the amount or not

payerAccountIBAN.description: Contains international bank account number of the payer

requestorAccountIBAN.description: Contains international bank account number of the requestor

requestToPayScheme.description: Indicates the scheme in which request to pay message is sent or received

requestorProxy.description: Contains the proxy identification of the requestor

payerProxyType.description: Indicates type of proxy identification of the payer

requestorProxyType.description: Indicates type of proxy identification of the requestor

payerProxy.description: Contains the proxy identification of the payer

maximumInstallmentsAllowed.description: Indicates the maximum number of installments allowed as specified by the requestor

outstandingAmount.description: Contains the aggregate outstanding principal amount thereof after giving effect to any borrowings and prepayments or repayments of Committed Loans

chargeAccountId.description: Indicates the account to which the charges has to be levied. Used when charges are to be taken from a separate account

chargeAccountCurrencyId.description: When a charge account is specified, this field indicates the currency of the charge account

requestToPayMessage.description: Indicates the possible message type as received by the payer

endToEndReference.description: Indicates the end to end reference for the payment. This field can be provided by the person who instructs the payment and this flows through the lifecycle of the payment.

billId.description: Indicates the bill reference or Id

billingPeriodFrom.description: Contains the start date of the request to pay service for which payment is requested by the requestor

billingPeriodTo.description: Contains the end date of the request to pay service for which payment is requested by the requestor.

subject.description: The subject of the message to be sent or received.

requestorReferenceInformation.description: Contains a Building Society Roll Number, Credit Card Number, or Utility Customer Account Number, etc. that the requestor wishes to pass on to the payer to make payment

receivedDateTime.description: Indicates the date and time when the request to pay message is received for payer and requestor

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

chargeName.description: The description of the charge to be taken for payment

chargeCurrency.description: Indicates the currency code of the charge account from where the fee is deducted

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

chargeAccountCurrencyAmount.description: Holds the charge to be applied for the corresponding charge type for the order in the currency of the charge account

basketReference.description: Indicates the identifier of the basket to be displayed on the biller's portal and paid by the payer

requestorUrl.description: Contains the URL of the requestor which allows the payer to access the portal of the requestor

errorDetail.description: Error details of the Bundle account

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

requestedExecutionDate.description: Indicates the date at which the payment needs to be executed as requested by the Requestor

payerName.description: Contains the name of the payer

payerStreetName.description: Contains the street name of the payer

payerBuildingNumber.description: Contains the building number of the payer

payerPostalCode.description: Contains the postal code of the payer

payerTownName.description: Contains the town name of the payer

payerCountry.description: Contains the country of the payer

payerDateOfBirth.description: Contains the date of birth of payer

payerCityOfBirth.description: Contains the city of birth of payer

payerCountryOfBirth.description: Contains the country of birth of the payer

payerBankBic.description: Contains the bank Business Identfier Code (BIC) of the payer

payerBankSortCode.description: Contains the bank sort code of the payer

serviceAgreementCode.description: Contains a pre-agreed service code which has been agreed between the payer and the requestor

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order. For example: BEN(All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR(All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA(Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)

requestorBankSortCode.description: Contains the bank sort code of the requestor

requestorBankBic.description: Contains the bank Business Identfier Code (BIC) of the requestor

requestorName.description: Contains the name of the requestor

requestorStreetName.description: Contains the street name of the requestor

requestorBuildingNumber.description: Contains the building number of the requestor

requestorPostalCode.description: Contains the postal code of the requestor

requestorTownName.description: Contains the town name of the requestor

requestorCountry.description: Contains the country of the requestor

requestorDateOfBirth.description: Contains the date of birth of the requestor

requestorCityOfBirth.description: Contains the city of birth of the requestor

requestorCountryOfBirth.description: Contains the country of birth of the requestor

remittanceReference.description: Contains the remittance reference of the requestor's bill

remittanceLocationMethod.description: Indicates the possible methods in which the remittance information can be sent

remittanceLocationDetails.description: Contains the actual value of the remittance method by which remittance information is sent

remittanceInformation.description: Indicates the remittance information that is supplied to enable the matching/reconciliation of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system, in an unstructured form.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

amountModificationAllowed.description: Indicates if a payer is allowed to modify the amount or not

payerAccountIBAN.description: Contains international bank account number of the payer

requestorAccountIBAN.description: Contains international bank account number of the requestor

requestToPayScheme.description: Indicates the scheme in which request to pay message is sent or received

requestorProxy.description: Contains the proxy identification of the requestor

payerProxyType.description: Indicates type of proxy identification of the payer

requestorProxyType.description: Indicates type of proxy identification of the requestor

payerProxy.description: Contains the proxy identification of the payer

maximumInstallmentsAllowed.description: Indicates the maximum number of installments allowed as specified by the requestor

outstandingAmount.description: Contains the aggregate outstanding principal amount thereof after giving effect to any borrowings and prepayments or repayments of Committed Loans

chargeAccountId.description: Indicates the account to which the charges has to be levied. Used when charges are to be taken from a separate account

chargeAccountCurrencyId.description: When a charge account is specified, this field indicates the currency of the charge account

requestToPayMessage.description: Indicates the possible message type as received by the payer

endToEndReference.description: Indicates the end to end reference for the payment. This field can be provided by the person who instructs the payment and this flows through the lifecycle of the payment.

billId.description: Indicates the bill reference or Id

billingPeriodFrom.description: Contains the start date of the request to pay service for which payment is requested by the requestor

billingPeriodTo.description: Contains the end date of the request to pay service for which payment is requested by the requestor.

subject.description: The subject of the message to be sent or received.

requestorReferenceInformation.description: Contains a Building Society Roll Number, Credit Card Number, or Utility Customer Account Number, etc. that the requestor wishes to pass on to the payer to make payment

receivedDateTime.description: Indicates the date and time when the request to pay message is received for payer and requestor

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The code related to override message.

options.description: The usable options for the override.

The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual Transact error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request

notesToRequestor.description: Contains any notes sent to the requestor by the payer

paymentStatuses.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

requestToPayDirection.description: Indicates the direction of the request to pay message that is being sent or received

requestedExpiryDate.description: Contains the expiry date of the request to pay message

receivedDateTime.description: Indicates the date and time when the request to pay message is received for payer and requestor

basketReference.description: Indicates the identifier of the basket to be displayed on the biller's portal and paid by the payer

requestorUrl.description: Contains the URL of the requestor which allows the payer to access the portal of the requestor

errorDetail.description: Error details of the Bundle account

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

chargeName.description: The description of the charge to be taken for payment

chargeCurrency.description: Indicates the currency code of the charge account from where the fee is deducted

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

chargeAccountCurrencyAmount.description: Holds the charge to be applied for the corresponding charge type for the order in the currency of the charge account

paymentStatus.description: Describes the current status of the payment order in the payment system
Describes the current status of the payment order in the payment system

acceptanceDateTime.description: Contains the transaction date and time returned by the payer's payment system on submission of the payment transaction by the payer after the response to request to pay has triggerred a payment in the payment system

Contains the transaction date and time returned by the payer's payment system on submission of the payment transaction by the payer after the response to request to pay has triggerred a payment in the payment system

additionalInformationToRequestor.description: Contains the additional information that is sent to requestor by the payer

additionalInformationToPayer.description: Contains the additional information that is sent to the payer by the requestor

messageToPayer.description: Contains the messsage sent to the payer by the requestor

notesToPayer.description: Contains any notes sent to the payer by the requestor

messageToRequestor.description: Contains the message sent to the requestor by the payer

notesToRequestor.description: Contains any notes sent to the requestor by the payer

endToEndReference.description: Indicates the end to end reference for the payment. This field can be provided by the person who instructs the payment and this flows through the lifecycle of the payment.

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

requestorBankBic.description: Contains the bank Business Identfier Code (BIC) of the requestor

requestorBankSortCode.description: Contains the bank sort code of the requestor

requestorAccountIBAN.description: Contains international bank account number of the requestor

requestorAccountNumber.description: Contains the account number of the requestor

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

dueDate.description: Identifies the date on which the activity is due.

remittanceInformation.description: Indicates the remittance information that is supplied to enable the matching/reconciliation of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system, in an unstructured form.

billId.description: Indicates the bill reference or Id

billingPeriodFrom.description: Contains the start date of the request to pay service for which payment is requested by the requestor

billingPeriodTo.description: Contains the end date of the request to pay service for which payment is requested by the requestor.

remittanceReference.description: Contains the remittance reference of the requestor's bill

requestToPayScheme.description: Indicates the scheme in which request to pay message is sent or received

requestorProxy.description: Contains the proxy identification of the requestor

subject.description: The subject of the message to be sent or received.

payerProxy.description: Contains the proxy identification of the payer

requestorReferenceInformation.description: Contains a Building Society Roll Number, Credit Card Number, or Utility Customer Account Number, etc. that the requestor wishes to pass on to the payer to make payment

remittanceLocationDetails.description: Contains the actual value of the remittance method by which remittance information is sent

outstandingAmount.description: Contains the aggregate outstanding principal amount thereof after giving effect to any borrowings and prepayments or repayments of Committed Loans

payerName.description: Contains the name of the payer

requestorName.description: Contains the name of the requestor

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order. For example: BEN(All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR(All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA(Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)

chargeAccountId.description: Indicates the account to which the charges has to be levied. Used when charges are to be taken from a separate account

chargeAccountCurrencyId.description: When a charge account is specified, this field indicates the currency of the charge account

requestToPayMessage.description: Indicates the possible message type as received by the payer

requestedExecutionDate.description: Indicates the date at which the payment needs to be executed as requested by the Requestor

requestorResponse.description: Contains the possible responses that the requestor can send to the payer

payerResponse.description: Contains the response provided by the payer for a request to pay message

requestToPayDirection.description: Indicates the direction of the request to pay message that is being sent or received

requestedExpiryDate.description: Contains the expiry date of the request to pay message

receivedDateTime.description: Indicates the date and time when the request to pay message is received for payer and requestor
